description: Airing Friday, May 8, 2015: We'll receive the latest jobs report later today. We check in with our reporter Mitchell Hartman on what to expect in today's number. Across the Atlantic, the seemingly endless Greek debt crisis continues. The eurozone finance minister will decide whether to release $8 billion in bailout money.Flint, Michigan started to draw its water from the Flint River, which residents say has made their tap water undrinkable.

title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, May 8, 2015
